2.title: Compassion
2.plot: Shot on the Upper East Side of Manhattan, on the street where First Lady Eleanor Roosevelt once walked in the 1960s. Meera Gandhi interviews millennial, Mike Tolkin, and the Madam Gandhi, performs her hit single song "The Future is Female."

3.title: Celebration
3.plot: Celebration, episode shot on location in the stunning Central Park. Meera Gandhi talks about celebrating life with Rob Goldstone. Book recommendations Super Brain by Deepak Chopra and Beyond Words by Swami Satchidananda.

4.title: Peace
4.plot: Meera Gandhi explores peace and quiet time. Shot at the Ledgewood Estate in upstate NY, Meera speaks with Buddhist monk, Aria Das with Book recommendations Mindful Walking and The Way of Serenity. Transcend Gentleman perform a song.

5.title: Freedom
5.plot: Meera Gandhi explores the topic of FREEDOM in Dumbo, Brooklyn. Academy Award winning musician Tim Fain talks with Meera on the show about freedom and plays live on the show; his new hit single "Freedom."

6.title: Happiness
6.plot: Meera Gandhi discusses HAPPINESS in scenic Williamsburg, with dancer Jules Bakshi. Meera's parents are featured in the music segment called "Daddy O Daddy" - Famous soundtrack and music by Hong Kong Musician David Harilela.

7.title: Accomplishments
7.plot: Meera discusses the implications of ACCOMPLISHMENT at the United Nations in New York City. Comics Uniting Nations are guests on the show.

8.title: Karma and Destiny
8.plot: KARMA and DESTINY explores Chaiwali restaurant in Harlem, NYC. Chef Anita Trehan and broker Douglass Elliman, and Lisa Simonsen sit down with Meera. The Harlem Youth Gospel Choir sings the inspiration song "This Little Light Of Mine."

9.title: Revitalization
9.plot: REVITALIZATION features businesses in Hudson NY. Tracy Young Content, Montana Beutler and Tarik Currimbuoy speak about the successes of Hudson's impressive transformation from the brink of blight.

10.title: Exploring Yooga
10.plot: Exploring YOGA in the Upper East Side of NYC. Meera speaks to her own personal yoga guru, Inga Benson, world famous DJ, Donna D'Cruz about the meaning of yoga,. Chef Kunal gives tips on how to make better food choices in today's society.

11.title: Creativity
11.plot: Meera travels to Hoboken, to discuss Creativity with master artist, Juan Bernal. Current head of her own mentoring group, LaVelle Olexa discusses using her background in fashion to encourage creativity in the young ladies she mentors.

12.title: Climate Change
12.plot: Meera explores CLIMATE CHANGE. Andres Chang shares the connection between humans and nature. Ashok Vyas, anchor, discusses the effect of climate on the human psyche. Meera shares 3 tips on how to let climate improve your health.

13.title: Genesis
13.plot: Meera Gandhi discusses how and why she came up with the idea for the show and shares life lessons, making life simpler to navigate. Charming Tiffany Eatz is guest host, while Meera Gandhi is a guest in a role reversal.

locations: Williamsburg, Brooklyn, New York City, New York, USA
Long Island City, New York, USA
New York City, New York, USA
imdb.title: The Meera Gandhi Show
synopsis: The Meera Gandhi Show is a TV show like no other. The thirteen episode show features a brand new approach to talk television, done in true interview style, but with guests and topics for the modern man and woman. A format that brings guests in to discuss in-depth topics in a human and compassionate way.The aim of the show is to encourage people to live a life of positivity, spiritual understanding and inner peace. Globally recognized and award-winning influencer, humanitarian and philanthropist, Meera Gandhi is awesome, and refreshingly candid as the show goes in-depth into one-on-one interviews with significant influencers from all walks of life : friends, healers, spiritual gurus, politicians, diplomats, actors and lawyers. The key of the show is to re-discover tools to de-stress and live a more joyful, positive life. The show combined with amazing individuals gives us an exciting, moving glimpse into a happier way to live life. The show brings to life, nuggets of inspirational wisdom, combined with inspiring stories of people's childhood lessons, successes, failures, future endeavors, and what it means to give back.Each Episode touches on a trait or emotion, tenet or human quality. Love, Compassion, Creativity, Karma, Happiness, revitalization and topics like Climate Change push the limits of how human qualities, science and art intersect with Yoga, mediation and spirituality.Meera Gandhi has spent the last 15 years of her life prompting the idea of giving in many forms. From philanthropy to hands-on food programs, to creating and supporting foundations for women, have empowered women to achieve great things. Awards are given in Ms Gandhi's name, and provide a basis for many programs all of the world to uphold a standard of excellence both in her professional and personal life.The "Giving" line of products, from candles to hair care, assures that profits go to her foundation and to continue a body of work that is truly inspiring. The Meera Gandhi Show reflects all of those things and more.
